I had a left knee replacement surgery last February.
Dr R Zarnett was my surgeon.
The surgery was a total team approach which includes surgeon, anesthesiologist, nurses, physiologist etc. I had a pre- surgery interview  and a briefing on what to expect for the whole knee replacement process.

Dr Zarnett provided me with the ZB Mymobility app. It started a pre-surgery excises 30-days prior to the surgery and a 30-day post surgery excises. On top of the he booked an appointment with kinesiologist for 12 sessions which started one week after the surgery to teach me additional exercises to regain my mobility and strength.

The surgery lasted only 1hr & 15min and I was able to go home after recovery. A nerve block was provided for three day to block out the pain.
The nurse called for me every day for 3 days to check on my conditions until i removed the nerve block.

He also booked me an ice & compression machine for two week. As a result, I did not have any swelling and only used opioids for three nights for pain. Subsequently I did not need any more pain killers.

After the completion of kinesiology sessions I went back to my normal physiologist and masseur for further treatments.

At end of 6 months, I can walk/stand normal without pain and restarted my ballroom dancing slowly. Now it‚Äôs 8 months on and I am back to full ballroom dancing although my endurance is not as good as before but I can dance one routing at a time with rest in between.

Over all It has been a very pleasant experience.
Thanks to the wonderful team of Humber River Hospital knee replacement surgery team!
